html:
Wex Photo has a large inventory of used Canon RF gear. There are a few items on sale and full-frame RF mount cameras start at £689 for the original EOS R, which is still a very capable camera.

Wex Photo uses a 1-10 rating for the condition of the camera or lens. There are detailed descriptions about the conditions as well. These ratings can be trusted.

Wex Photo offers a full 12-month warrant on used gear, so you can buy with absolute confidence that you're going to be taken care of should something go wrong.

All gear is fully checked, tested and cleaned before they are made for sale.

Used Canon EOS R Camera Highlights

  • Canon EOS R Body starting at £689
  • Canon EOS R6 Body starting at £786
  • Canon EOS R6 Mark II Body starting at £1753
  • Canon EOS R5 Body starting at £1849
  • Canon EOS R3 Body starting at £3433

Check out the full inventory of used EOS R cameras at Wex Photo

Used Canon RF Lens Higlights

  • Canon RF 10-20mm f/4L STM starting at £2109
  • Canon RF 14-35mm f/4L IS USM starting at £1023
  • Canon RF 15-35mm f/2.8L IS USM starting at £1431
  • Canon RF 24-70mm f/2.8L IS USM starting at £2009
  • Canon RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM starting at £979
  • Canon RF 28-70mm f/2L USM starting at £2213
  • Canon RF 24-105 f/2.8L IS USM Z starting at £2957
  • Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM starting at £1659
  • Canon RF 70-200mm f/4L IS USM starting at £1179
  • Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM starting at £2194
  • Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM starting at £2110
  • Canon RF 100-400mm f/5.6-8 IS USM starting at £531
  • Canon RF 100-500mm f/4.5-7.1L IS USM starting at £1982

Check out the full inventory of Canon RF lenses at Wex Photo

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
